sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from './Rating' const Product = ({ product }) => { return ( {product.name} {product.price === 0 ? ' ' : product.price + (product.price * 0.25)} {product.price}DH ) } export default Product
